tooltips.messagePermission:
Allows to send messages to other users.

* all – can send to all
* team – can send only to teammates
* no – cannot send
tooltips.assignmentPermission:
Allows to assign records to other users.

* all – no restriction
* team – can assign only to teammates
* no – can assign only to self
tooltips.userPermission:
Allows view activities, calendar and stream of other users.

* all – can view all
* team – can view activities of teammates only
* no – can't view
tooltips.portalPermission: Access to portal information, the ability to post messages to portal users.
tooltips.groupEmailAccountPermission: Access to group email accounts, the ability to send emails from group SMTP.
tooltips.massUpdatePermission: The ability to perform mass update of records.
tooltips.followerManagementPermission: Allows to manage followers of specific records.
tooltips.dataPrivacyPermission: Allows to view and erase personal data.

messages.changesAfterClearCache: All changes in an access control will be applied after cache is cleared.
